title: [P3D] Lockheed Martin - Prepar3D Academic v2.4.11570.0
description:
For those who are interested in the Academic version of Prepar3D v2.4 (Full Install).

The Academic version is the "Only" Prepar3D version that is planned on supporting the PMDG Product(s) once released for P3Dv2 (Q1 2015). 

they (PMDG) specifically stated that PMDG products currently only licensed for personal use/Students version of P3D and have not yet
reached an agreement with their partners, licensing their products to the professional market (Pro & Pro-Plus versions of Prepar3D) 

there are other vendors like PMDG that will license their product for Personal learning/Students and not for the Professional market. therefore those products will only work on the Academic version of Prepar3D as well.

Those vendors who are planning on releasing "two" versions of their product, one for personal use and the other for the professional market, hefty price is expected on the version that will work on the Pro/Pro-plus. by installing the Pro version you are limiting yourself to the more expensive License/cost of 3rd party tools.
Academic version on the other hand, all 3rd party addons will be much cheaper and yet with the same exact functionality.


Crack is Included.

Thanks to @Airbuspfd for providing the Crack
